content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"According to EPAM security policies related to the usage of public resources it has been made the decision to stop provisioning and using Google accounts and its related applications for storage and collaboration of company related content.
